title: #249: Breaking Down Tiger King Part 1
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa discuss the Netflix show 'Tiger King' and the Wondery podcast 'Joe Exotic, Tiger King.' We breakdown the behaviour and key details that may have been overlooked.
